alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan and eastern Taylor Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Abilene, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Baird, Wylie, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Putnam, Atwell, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, Rowden, Caps, Impact, Camp Tonkawa, Ovalo, Admiral, Kirby Lake and I-20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 279 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
